# File lib/jabber4r/protocol.rb, line 464
464:       def Iq.gen_registration(session, id, username, password, email, name)
465:         iq = Iq.new(session, id)
466:         iq.type = "set"
467:         iq.xmlns = "jabber:iq:register"
468:         iq.data = XMLElement.new("username").add_data(username).to_s 
469:         iq.data << XMLElement.new("password").add_data(password).to_s
470:         iq.data << XMLElement.new("email").add_data(email).to_s
471:         iq.data << XMLElement.new("name").add_data(name).to_s
472:         return iq
473:       end
